results.name: Numerator of the Harary number for the star graph s_n.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Harary Index
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-6,10,-12,12,-10,6,-3,1).
formula: It appears that a(n + 1) = A060819(n-1) * A060819(n + 2). - _Paul Curtz_, Dec 23 2010 [Corrected by _Joerg Arndt_, Jan 04 2011]
a(n) = 3*a(n-4) - 3*a(n-8) + a(n-12). This is not the shortest recurrence. -_Paul Curtz_, Mar 27 2011
a(n) = n*(n+3)*(3-i^(n*(n-1)))/8, where i=sqrt(-1).  - _Bruno Berselli_, Apr 07 2011
program: (MAGMA) m:=50; R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), m); [0] cat Coefficients(R!(x^2*(-1 - 2*x - 5*x^4 + 3*x^5 - 2*x^6 + x^7)/((x - 1)^3*(x^2 + 1)^3))); // _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 21 2018
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Apr 30 2009
